entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:58 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
